venue.name: LTK Bar and Kitchen (Legal's Test Kitchen)

item.description:
Who's up for an experiment?

LTK claims to present a cutting edge dining experience with state of the art design and a diverse menu.

Menu
http://games.legalsea...

Park Lane Garage, which is below LTK, offers validation for half off your parking...up to two hours. There are also metered parking spots nearby.

MBTA South Station transfer to Silver Line (this is a bus NOT a train) heading to Logan Airport Terminals get off at Silver Line Way Exit near intersection of Trilling Way and Northern Ave. Walk West on Northern Ave towards D St.

Please bring enough cash to pay for your meal, drinks and tax.

Mother's Day is the next day...so Happy Mother's Day to all the BBL moms.

group.name: Breakfast, Brunch, Lunch, & Dinner Meetup Group

item.name: Lunch at Legal Test Kitchen (LTK)
